attributes.action: Investigate Diagnostic Procedure in the Psychiatric Profession.
attributes.additional_details:
"On being sane in insane places" Rosenhan
"The Psychopath Test" Jon Ronson
"The Stanford Prison Experiment" Zimbardo
attributes.background: Psychiatry is under criticism for its subjectivity and unaccountability.Brief crises are defined as lifelong conditions.There is no recognition of this ambiguity.Complaints are seen as symptoms.Patients are misunderstood or slandered.The pessimism of working in a Hospital causes Confirmation Bias

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
